name: Shape: Origins
description:
Shape was a simple man living through an existential crisis: How did I get here? Where did I come from? Who are my parents?

As such, he decided to do what any public domain hero would - search the earth for his origin comic to have all his questions answered! Why don't you help him? You seem pretty bored!

A simple game about exploration for Public Domain Jam by Brennan McNamara and Devon Wiersma, based on the character The Shape which is now in public domain (but don't go there yet if you haven't beaten the game - there be spoilers)!

For your viewing pleasure, this game is best played by downloading the executable below!

(Updates and bug fixes are gradually being applied throughout the day)

_____________CONTROLS_____________

Escape views the comic window

R resets the level (your comic collection progress will be saved)

WASD movement

Mouse Movement to turn camera

Q and E change Shape's size

1, 2 and 3 swap between Shape's forms (Ball, Water Cube and Bulldozer, respectively)

Space performs special interactions: Digs while in ball form and lifts objects while in water form
